# presentationTimeStamp

**Instance Property**

The time at which the sample will be presented.

## Declaration

```swift
var presentationTimeStamp: CMTime
```

## Discussion

If a single struct applies to each of the samples, they all have this duration.

## Properties

- **decodeTimeStamp**: The time at which the sample will be decoded.
- **duration**: The duration of the sample.
